Description: Pottery ostracon containing a letter on money matters written in Coptic.
Bibliographic references: Hall 1905 / Coptic and Greek Texts of the Christian Period from Ostraka, Stelae, etc. in the British Museum (p.21, pl.16)
Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (82569) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/82569)
